text: We integrated Uniswap V3 into our pipeline and measured swaps per second; audits were provided by OpenZeppelin.
Aave reported an increase in TVL last quarter. The security review was done by CertiK.
Lido's staking contracts run on Ethereum and collaborations include partnerships with Figment.
SushiSwap announced a grant from a16z to expand liquidity incentives.
Curve Finance focuses on stablecoin swaps; security audits by Trail of Bits increased confidence.
Balancer Labs introduced a new AMM curve; independent auditors included PeckShield.
We indexed data from MakerDAO governance proposals and referenced audits from Quantstamp.
1inch aggregates liquidity across protocols like Uniswap and SushiSwap; code review by OpenZeppelin was cited.
Compound governance proposals were discussed at a conference sponsored by Consensys.
PancakeSwap runs on BSC and was audited by CertiK earlier this year.
OpenZeppelin and Trail of Bits often publish findings about vulnerabilities in DeFi protocols.
DeFi protocols such as Aave, Compound, and MakerDAO rely on audits by Quantstamp and PeckShield.
